model_specification: p(accept) = 1 / (1 + exp( - (bias + weight_self * split_self - penalty * max(split_opp - split_self, 0) ) ))
model_summary: A logistic utility model in which the acceptance probability is determined by a baseline bias combined with the weight on the responder’s allocated amount (split_self), counteracted by an inequality aversion penalty when the opponent’s share (split_opp) exceeds the responder’s. This parsimonious model uses three learnable parameters with bounded scales to predict binary accept/reject decisions.
